Translations.Text: ha mim
sasil-eul balghyeojuneun i seongseoe maengsehanila
hananim-eun geugeos-eul alab-eolo gyesihayeoss-euni ilo hayeo neohuiga i haehago baeudolog ham-ila
sillo geugeos-eun hananim seongseoui mojeon-e issneun geos-eulo jihyega gadeug chaewojin geos-ila
neohuiga beos-eonan baegseong-ila hayeohananimkkeseo neohui moduleul bangchihal su issgessneunyo
hananim-i yes baegseongdeul-ege manh-eun-yeeonjadeul-eul bonaess-eumae
yeeonjaga ileuji anihan gos-ieobs-eoss-euna salamdeul-i geuleul jolonghaessnola
geulihayeo hananim-eun ideulboda him-i ganghan geudeul-eul myeolmangke hago yes baegseongdeul-ui biyuga gyohun-i doedo log hayeossnola
geudaega geudeul-ege cheonjileul changjohan bun-i nugusinyo lago mudneundamyeon gwonneung-gwa jihyelo chungmanhasin hananim-e-uihae changjodoeeossseubnida lago geudeul-eundaedabhalila
geubun-eun daejileul dueo neohuiuihyusigcheolo hasigo geu an-e gil-eul dusini ilo hayeo neohuiga indodoe dolog hagoja ham-ila
geubun-eun iljeonghan yang-ui bileul naelige hasieo jug-eun daejie saengmyeong eul jusidoda geuwa gat-i neohuido buhwal hanola
geubun-eun modeun geos-eul changjohasimae jaung-eul dugo tto neohuiga tal bae deulgwa gachugdeul-eul dueossnola

ilihayeo neohuiga deung-wieseo anjeonghago neohuiga geugos-e anjeonhage anj-a iss-eul ttae neohui junim-eul yeom-wonha myeo jeohuiga geuleohge hal su eobsneun geos eul jeohuiege sunjongke hayeo jusin geubunkke yeong-gwang-i iss-eusoseo lago mal hago
jeohuineun jeohui junimkkelo dol-a gage doenaida lago malhadolog ham ila
geuleona bulsinjadeul-eun geubun-ui ilbu jongdeul-i hananim-ui bunsin-ila mal hani sillo ingan-eun omanbulsonhadoda
hananimkkeseo seuseuloleul wihae ttaldeul-eul taeghasigo neohuineun adeul-eul seontaeghadolog hayeossdan mal-inyo
jabilousin hananimkke biyuhaess deon sosig-i geudeul-ege ileulttaemyeon geu ui eolgul-eun eodueojimyeo gip-eun seulpeum eulo gadeug chadeola
jangsig-eulo yang-yugdoen geunyeodeul-eul hananimkke biyuhalyeo hana geugeos-eun hananimgwa biyuhal iyuga doeji mos haji anhneunyo

geuligo bulsinjaneun jabilousin hananim-ui jongdeul-in cheonsadeul-eul yeoseong-i la hadeola geudeul-eun cheonsadeul-i changjo doel ttae moggyeog-ilado hayeossdan mal-inyo geudeul-ui jeung-geoneun gilogdoeeo jilmun-eul badge doelila
geudeul-eun jabilousin hananimkkeseo wonhasyeossdamyeon jeohuineun gyeolko geugeos deul-eul sungbaehaji anihaess-eulilago malhana geudeul-ui mal-eneun jisig-i eobs neun geojismal-ila
animyeon hananimkkeseo geudeul-ege igeos ijeon-e seongseoleul jueo geudeullo hayeogeum geuleohge ttaleudolog haessdan mal inyo
geuleohji anhnola jeohuineun jeohui seonjodeul-i ttalassdeon jong-gyoleul balgyeonhayeo geudeul-ui gil-eul seuseulo ttaleul ppun-ibni da lago geudeul-eun malhadeola

hananim-i geudae ijeon baegseongdeul ege gyeong-gojaleul bonaess-eul ttaemada geu deul jung-ui buyuhan salamdeuldo jeohuineun jeohui seonjodeul-i ttalassdeon jong-gyoleul bal gyeonhayeo geudeul-ui gil-eul ttaleul ppun-ibni da lago hadeola

modeun seonjijaneun neohuiga seonjo deullobuteo balgyeon han geosboda deo na-eun bog-eum-eul gajigo wassnolago malhaess-euna bulsinjaneun dangsindeul-eul tonghayeo bonaeeojin geos-eul midji anhneunda malhadeola
geulihayeo hananim-i geu beol-eul naelisini bola jinlileul geoyeoghaneun jadeul-ui malloga eotteo haessdeonyo
abeulaham-eun geuui abeojiwa baegseongdeul-ege malhagil sillo jeoneun yeo leobun-i sungbaehaneun geos-eul sungbaehaji anihamyeo
naleul changjohasin hananimman-eul gyeongbaehanani sillo geubunkkeseo naleul indohasil geos-ila
abeulaham-eun geuui husondeul-egei mal-eul namgyeoss-euni amado geudeul-eun hananimkkelo dol-agalila
geuleona hananim-eun ideulgwa i deul seonjodeul-ege jinliwa sasil-eul balghyeojuneun han seonjijaga imhal ttaekka ji hyeonse-ui salm-eul hyanglaghadoleug dueoss nola
geuleona jinliga geudeul-ege i leuleoss-eul ttae geudeul-eun igeos-eun masul-e bulgwahani ulineun igeos-eul midji anh eulilago malhadeola
bulsinjaneun i kkulan-i du dosi ui jidoja-egeneun gyesidoeji ani hayeossdeonyo lago muddeola

geudeul-i geudae junim-ui eunhyeleul bunbaehandan mal-inyo hyeonse-ui saenghwalsog eseo geudeul-ege saenghwal-ui yangsig-eul bun baehaneun geos-eun hananim-isila geudeuljung-ilbuegeneun jiwileul daleun ja boda nop-i dueo geudeullo hayeogeum daleun jadeul-eul jidohadolog hayeossnola geuleonageudae junim-ui eunhyeneun geudeul-i chugjeog han jaemulboda deoug joh-eun geos-ila

baegseongdeul-i bulsin-ui muliga doe lyeo haji ani handamyeon hananim-eun jabilousin geubun-eul modoghan gagjaleul wihae geudeul-ui jib jibung-gwa geudeul-i oleuneun gyedan-eul eun-eulo jangsighayeo jul sudo iss-eulila
geudeul-ui jib mundeuldo geuligo geudeul-ui gidaeneun chimsangdo eun-eulo jangsig doel su iss-eumyeo
geum-eulodo jangsigdoel su iss-euli la geuleona i modeun geos-eun hyeonsesaeng hwal-ui hyanglag-e bulgwahamyeo geudae junim ap-ui naeseneun uiloun jadeul-eul wihae issnola
hananim-eun geubun-ui jabilousingyohun-eulobuteo oemyeonhaneun jaleul wihaesatan-eul dusa satan-i geuui chinguga doedeola
geulihayeo satandeul-i geudeullo hayeogeum baleun gil-eseo beos-eonage ha na geudeul-eun seuseuloga olh-eun gillo indodoeneun geos-eulo saeng-gaghanola
geuga hananimkke ileuleo malha deola neowa na saie dongjjoggwa seo jjog saiui geoli mankeum-ina saiga iss-eoss-eumyeon joh-ass-eulyeonman sillo saaghanmulila
neohuiga jeojileun joeag-eulo in hayeo geunal-eneun eoneu geosdo neohuie ge yuyonghaji moshani neohuineun hamkke beol-eul bad-eulila
geudaeneun gwimeogeolilo hayeogeum deudge hal su iss-eumyeo jangnimgwa banghwanghaneun jaleul indohal su issneunyo
hananim-i geudaeleul geoduwogan huelado geubun-eun geudeul-ege eungbeol eul naelisinila
hananimkkeseo geudeul-ege yagsoghan geos-eul geudaeege boyeo julini sillo geubun-eun geudeul-eul jeabhal neunglyeog-eulo chungmanhasinila
geudaeege gyesidoen geos-eul jiki la sillo geudaeneun godbaleun gil-wie issnola
sillo geugeos-eun geudaewa geudae baegseong-eul wihan bog-eum-ini neohuiga god jilmun-eul bad-eulila
geudae ijeon hananim-ui seonjija deul-ege mul-eobola jabilousin ha nanim oee daleun geos-eul sungbaehala ha yeossdeonyo
hananim-eun geubun-ui malsseumgwa deobul-eo moseleul palaowa geuui chujongjadeul-ege bonaeni naneun man-yuui junim-i bonaen han seonjijala malhayeossdeola
geuleona geuga hananim-ui malsseum eul gajigo geudeul-ege gass-eul ttae geudeul eun bius-eossnola
geulihayeo hananim-eun chalyelo ijeon-ui geosboda deo keun geos-eulo geudeul eul beolhayeo geudeul-i hananim-egelo gwiuihagileul balaessnola
geudeul-i malhagil o masulsayeo geubunkkeseo dangsinkke seong-yaghan daelo u lileul wihae gidohala geulihamyeon u liga dangsin-eul mid-euliyo lago hadeo la
hananimkkeseo geudeullobuteo beol-eulgeodueo juni bola geudeul-eun yagsog-eul kkaetteulinola
palaoneun geuui baegseongdeul-ege baegseongdeul-iyeo aegub-ui wang-gug-i na an e issji anhneunyo ttohan gangmul-i nae gungjeon mit-eulo heuleuji anhneunyo geulae do neohuineun ihaehaji moshaneunyo
bojalgeos eobsneun geuligo ungbyeondo eobsneun i sanaeleul bola naega deo hul lyunghaji anhneunyo
geuegeneun geumpaljjido eobs-eumyeo cheonsadeuldo geuleul ttalaojido anhneundanmal-inyo
ileohdeus geuneun geuui baegseongdeul-eul eoliseogge hani geudeul-eun geuege bog jonghayeoss-eumae sillo geudeul-eun joejieun baegseongdeul-ieossnola
geudeul-i hananim-eul yogdoege ha yeoss-eul ttae geubun-eun geudeul-ege eungbeol-eul naelisa geudeul moduleul mul-e igsake hayeossnola
hananim-eun geudeul-ui seonlyeleul hu sedaeleul wihan gyohun-eulo sam-assnola
maliaui adeul yesuleul yeleul deulmyeon geudaeui baegseong-eun geuleul jolongha myeo solan-eul piugo
uliui sindeul-i hullyunghanyo a nimyeon geuga hullyunghanyo lago geudeul-eun malhaessdeola ileohdeus geudeul-eun geudaeegenonjaenghalyeo hayeoss-euni nonjaeng-eul ilsamneunmulideul-ila
geuneun han jong-e bulgwahanila hananim-eun geuege eunhyeleul bepul-eo i seula-el jason-eul wihan gyohun-i doege hayeossnola
hananim-i wonhasyeossdamyeon geubun-euncheonsadeullo hayeogeum daejiwiui gyeseungjaga doel su issge hayeoss-eulila
sillo yesuui jaelim-eun simpan-i dagaom-eul yesihaneun geos-ila illeo galodoe geu sigag-e daehayeo uisimchi malgo naleul ttaleula igeos-i olh-eun gil-ila
geuligo satan-i neohuileul yuhog haji moshadolog hala sillo geuneun neohuiui bunmyeonghan jeog-ila

yesuga bunmyeonghan yejeung-gwa deobul-eo geudeul-ege ileuleo malhagil naega jihyeleul gajigo neohuiege wassnani neohuiga nonjaenghaneun geos-eul balghyeo jugess nola geuleomeulo hananim-eul dulyeowo hago naege sunjonghala
hananim-eun naui junim-iyo tto han neohuiui junim-ila geuleomeulo geu bunman-eul gyeongbaehala igeos-i baleun gil inila
geuleona geudeul jung-ui mulideul-eun uigyeon-eul dalli haess-euni geudeul joeindeul egeneun gotongseuleoun nal beol-i iss-eu lila
geudeul-eun alji moshaneun sungan-e dagchyeool geu siganman-eul gidaligo iss dan mal-inyo
geunal-ui chingudeul-eun seologa seo lo-ege jeog-i doelila geuleona uilo un jadeulman-eun je-oela
naui jongdeul-iyeo geunal-ui neohui egeneun dulyeoumdo seulpeumdo eobsnola
ideul-eun hananim-ui malsseum-eul mid eo iseullam-e gwiuihan jadeul-ini
neohuiwa geuligo anaega hamkke cheongug-eulo deul-eogala neohuiga gippeohalila

hwang-geum-ui jeobsideulgwa keobdeul-i geu deul juwileul maemdolmyeo geu an-eneun geudeul-ui yeonghon-i wonhaneun modeun geosgwa geudeul-ui nundeul-eul gappeohage hal modeun geosdeul-i issnani neohuineun geu an-eseo yeongsaenghal geos-ila
geugeos-eun neohuiga haenghan daega-e ttala mullyeo bad-eun cheongug-eulo
neohuineun geu an-eseo pungseonghan gwail-eul masbomyeo geugeos-e manjoghalila
geuleona joeindeul-egeneun jiog-uibeol-i iss-eul geos-imyeo geudeul-eun geugos-e seo yeongjuhage doenola
geudeul-eul wihae geu beol-i gabyeowojil su eobs-euni geudeul-eun geu an-eseo jeolmanghadoda
igeos-eun hananim-i geudeul-eul bu danghage han geos-i anila seuseuloleul yogdoege han geos-eun geudeul jasindeul-ieoss nola
ittae geudeul-eun ju-in-isiyeo ju nim-eulo hayeogeum beol-eul geodueo judo log hayeo jusoseo lago hosohani geuleol su eobsnola neohuineun geugos-eseo salge doelila daedabhasideola
hananimkkeseo neohuiege jinlileuljueossgeonman neohui daedasuneun geu jinli leul jeung-ohamyeo
geudeul seuseulo eummoleul kkumyeoss-eu na hananim-eun seunglike hayeossnola
hananimkkeseo geudeul-i sumgineun geosgwa geudeul-i jugobadneun bimil-ui dae hwaleul deudji mosham-ila saenglahaneunyo anila ttohan cheonsadeul-i gilogha nila
illeogalodoe jabiloun hananimkkeseo adeul-eul gajyeossdamyeon naege jeil meonjeo gyeongbaehaneun jaga doelila
cheonjiui junimmisimyeo gwonja-e oleusil junimkke myeong-gwang-i iss-eusoseo sillo geubun-eun bulsinjadeul-i myosahan bun-i anisila
geuleomeulo geojisgwa yogdoeneun mal e tamnighan geudeul-eul geudaelo dula geudeul-i yagsogbadneun geunal-eul maj-ihalila
geubun-eun haneul-edo gyesimyeo dae jiwiedo gyesineun hananim-eulo jihyewa asim-eulo chungmanhasin bun-isila
haneulgwa daejiwa geu saie issneun modeun wang-gug-i geubun-ui geos-eulo geubunkke chugbog-i iss-eusoseo geubunman-i simpan-ui nal-eul algo gyesini neohuineun geubunkkelo dol-a ganola
hananim anin daleun geos-eul sungbaehan jadeul-egeneun jungjaehal neunglyeog-i eobs eudoe jinlileul jeung-eonhan janeun ye-oelo geudeul-eun geuleul algo issnola
geudeul-eul changjohan bun-i nugu-i nyo mudneundamyeon hananim-ilago geudeul-eunmalhanila geuleomyeonseodo geudeul-eun jinlilobuteo oemyeonhalyeo haneunyo
juyeo sillo geudeul-eun midji anhneunbaegseongdeul-ibnida lago malhaneun yeeonjaui oechim-i deullyeossnola
geudaeyeo geudeullobuteo meolli ha la geuligo annyeonghi iss-eula malhala geudeul-eun god alge doelila
